DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : HARMAN TO BUY SWISS VIDEO-EQUIPMENT MAKER
DOC.TEXT: Northridge-based Harman International Industries Inc. said it agreed to buy Studer Revox A.G. , a maker of professional video and audio equipment , from its Swiss utility-company parent , Motor Columbus . Terms were not disclosed . Harman said the acquisition will complement its own line of video , stereo and speaker products . Studer Revox is based in Regensdorf , Switzerland . Harman expects to close the deal within 30 days .
